attributes.action: Stop the TPD rules of vaping!
attributes.background: From may 2017 the government are bringing in new rules so that suppliers can no longer sell e juice bottles that hold more than 10ml of liquids they also can't sell tanks that hold more than 2ml of liquid there is more rules which are ridiculous to try and stop vaping, search TPD on google

rejection.details: The issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Tobacco Products Directive (TPD) is an EU Directive. You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to work with other EU member states to change the TPD.
